		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = TUR_saviour_officer_coup
		}
		localization_key = TUR_saviour_officer_coup
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_get_opda_name
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = TUR_OPDA_idea
				has_idea = TUR_OPDA_idea_2
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_get_opda_name_opda
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = TUR_OPD_idea
				has_idea = TUR_OPD_idea_2
				has_idea = TUR_OPD_idea_3
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_get_opda_name_opd
	}
}

	text = {

		localization_key = TUR_millet_state
	}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_armenian_population_230
	text = {
		trigger = {
			230 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_armenian_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_armenian_population_230_yes
	}
}

			353 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_armenian_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_armenian_population_353_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_armenian_state_353
	text = {
		trigger = {
			353 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_armenian_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {

				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_armenian_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_armenian_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_armenian_state_1019_yes
	}
}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_greek_population_339_yes
	}

					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_greek_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_greek_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_greek_population_900_yes
	}

			}
		}

	name = TUR_greek_state_186
	text = {
		trigger = {
			186 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_greek_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {

					AND = {

					}

						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_arab_state_679_yes
	}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_arab_state_831_war_support_factor
	text = {
		trigger = {
			831 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
				has_variable = TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_arab_state_831_war_support_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_arab_state_831_political_power_factor
	text = {
		trigger = {
			831 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
				has_variable = TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_arab_state_831_political_power_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_arab_state_832
	text = {
		trigger = {
			832 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_arab_state_832_yes
	}
}

				has_state_flag = TUR_arab_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_arab_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}

	}

				OR = {
					AND = {

					}

	name = TUR_south_slavic_millet_text_tt

		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_population_text_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_state_text_tt
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_south_slavic_millet_text_desc_tt
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_population_text_desc_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_state_text_desc_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_south_slavic_population_45
	text = {
		trigger = {
			45 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_south_slavic_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_south_slavic_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_south_slavic_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_population_45_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_south_slavic_population_45_stability_factor

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_south_slavic_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_south_slavic_state_203_yes
	}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_albanian_millet_text_tt
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_albanian_population_text_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_albanian_state_text_tt
	}

	name = TUR_albanian_millet_text_desc_tt
	text = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected } }
		localization_key = TUR_albanian_population_text_desc_tt
	}
	text = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = TUR_millet_state_selected }
		localization_key = TUR_albanian_state_text_desc_tt
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_albanian_population_44
	text = {
		trigger = {
			44 = {
				check_variable = { TUR_albanian_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_albanian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_albanian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_albanian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_albanian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_albanian_population_political_power_factor

						has_variable = TUR_albanian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_albanian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_albanian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_albanian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_albanian_population_871_yes
	}
}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_romanian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_romanian_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_romanian_population_76_yes
	}

				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_romanian_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_romanian_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_romanian_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_romanian_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_romanian_state_868_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_turkish_state_788_war_support_factor
	text = {
		trigger = {
			788 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_turkish_state
				has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_turkish_state_788_war_support_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_turkish_state_788_political_power_factor
	text = {
		trigger = {
			788 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_turkish_state
				has_variable = TUR_turkish_state_political_power_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_turkish_state_788_political_power_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_turkish_state_790
	text = {
		trigger = {
			790 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_turkish_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_turkish_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_turkish_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_turkish_state_790_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_azerbaijani_population_877

		trigger = {

				check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_state_level > 0 }
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {

					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_azerbaijani_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_azerbaijani_population_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_population_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_azerbaijani_population_877_yes
	}
}

				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_azerbaijani_state_938_political_power_factor_yes
	}
}
defined_text = {
	name = TUR_azerbaijani_state_939
	text = {
		trigger = {
			939 = {
				has_state_flag = TUR_azerbaijani_state
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_azerbaijani_population_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_population_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_azerbaijani_population_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_population_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_azerbaijani_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_azerbaijani_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_azerbaijani_state_939_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_separatist_sentiments
	text = {
		trigger = {
			347 = {
				TUR_state_has_minority = yes
				TUR_is_controlled_by_us_or_subject_vilayet = yes
				OR = {
					TUR_state_has_minority_stability_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_war_support_factor = yes
					TUR_state_has_minority_political_power_factor = yes
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = ottoman_konstantiniyye_vilayet_separatist_sentiments_yes
	}
